about_the_game:
Uberich: Advent Sinners is set in a diverse, extensive, and enigmatic fictional world with countless scenes spanning from the main character's bedroom to imperial palaces, from bustling streets to unforgiving battlefields, from the god-forsaken ocean floor to the vastness of outer space, and many more!

The complete story of Uberich: Advent Sinners includes:

· 7 Books;
· 5,500+ Illustrations;
· 80-song Soundtrack;
· 40+ Main Characters;
· A 2,000,000 Words Storyline.

◼ STORY




In mid-September, a wave of excitement swept over the Horiverti Residence in the suburban hills when the Hartson sisters rescued Joe and his ex-girlfriend, Raina, from a dark alley. Joe could only recall being attacked by an elusive shadow while Raina begged him to flee to safety.



Chaos erupted when a mysterious woman in a black dress burst into the home, firing bursts of energy, only for another mysterious woman, named Annie, to come to their rescue. She led the group to the Enja Defense Science Institute to uncover the truth. Joe, initially disinterested, stepped up after discovering a tracking device on his person, proving that there was no escaping the situation.



The group discovered a horrifying secret in the Institute’s basement lab that connected various mysterious elements, including a shadowy attacker, a space blockade, and a high-orbit space station. These discoveries hinted at a complex web of intrigue involving religious wars, powerful words, and a secretive organization spoken of only by Annie. As the seemingly unrelated pieces came together, they pointed toward a future that could drastically change the world, with the once-deserted Horiverti Residence now buzzing with powerful energy and activity.

◼ GAME FEATURES


· An unrivalled wide stage: Hundreds of scenes present a credible world that challenges your imagination.



· Friends, Foes, or both?: Every character thinks independently and together they decide the development of the story.



· Screenplays and narrations that leave no stone unturned: A relatable fantasy world with words without leaving room for gratuitous clues and narratives.

· Masterful Soundtrack: Features a unique soundtrack crafted by ZIZZ STUDIO, famous for their musical masterpieces in hit visual novels such as Saya no Uta and Full Metal Daemon Muramasa. The main theme song is performed by Kanako Ito, the renowned singer of the Steins;Gate theme!

· Unique Personality Analysis: AI will integrate your in-game choices and generate a concise report about your unique personality.

· Full-scale Battles: Impactful experience comparable to the hottest blockbusters.



◼ INITIAL CHARACTERS




· Joe Castleton: Ophelia's new tenant. Oddly, he can't remember anything from two years ago. He used to have a good relationship with Raina at the same university but seems to have recently broken up, about which Joe is rather anxious.

· Raina Summers: Raina is an ordinary girl, a sophomore in Chemistry. She had nearly a year-long relationship with Joe but it faded over the summer. After an accidental street encounter on Sep 15, her life became increasingly unfortunate.

· Naomi Hartson: Lives with Ophelia, at an age suitable for upper elementary school but she doesn't attend school at all. She spends days leisurely, always coming up with fun ideas. Harassing Joe is her daily vices. And she consistently beats Joe in games.

· Ophelia Hartson: Lives in a suburban villa. Apart from Naomi, there is no other family member, making the enormous villa seem empty. She works as a luxury goods designer at a recently famous company, receiving enviable treatment despite young age.

· Annie Alois Schultz: Known for her intelligence and rare beauty, she radiates charm. However, her strong aura of mysticism often leaves others at a loss, and she enjoys it. She appeared suddenly in the battle against Chava, saving everyone.

· Chava Fon: The stranger who broke into Ophelia's house. Dressed and behaved oddly, with eyes full of resentment. She frequently checks the watch, often muttering to the timepiece with a Big Dipper pattern on its dial.

· Ember Chester: The girl frequently appearing before Joe, seemingly close to him. She is always smiling, gentle, and unobtrusive. Occasionally she shows up in Joe's bedroom in her underwear, leading to a suspicious relationship.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content.

name: Uberich: Advent Sinners Demo
short_description: The world and reality of Joe collapse as a sequence of paranormal events starts in September. A mysterious girl with physical powers named Chava wants him dead, as he can be a core key for her cult to dominate the reality between worlds.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, English
